instruction: Create a PowerPoint slide to introduce a new product.
output:
Title: Introducing CoolGadget

Text (on the slide): CoolGadget is a revolutionary and innovative gadget that will revolutionize the way we use technology. With its unique design, CoolGadget is the perfect device to make the most of a modern lifestyle. Discover the potential of CoolGadget and why you should make this essential part of your life. 

Image: A sleek and modern image of the product.
